dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 4346 EAH:
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

engrossed-amendment-form.current-chamber: In the House of Representatives, U. S.,

section.text: That the House agree to the amendment of the Senate to the bill (H.R. 4346) entitled An Act making appropriations for Legislative Branch for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2022, and for other purposes., with the following

amendment-instruction.text: In lieu of the matter proposed to be inserted by the amendment of the Senate, insert the following:

section.text: It is the sense of Congress that—

paragraph.text: the cost of insulin, a lifesaving medication for the approximately 7,400,000 Americans who need it, is often prohibitive;
in 2020, nearly 1 in 6 adults reported delaying, skipping, reducing the amount of, or otherwise not getting prescription drugs because of the costs of the drugs; and
increased barriers to accessing necessary medication can lead to lower medication use and increase in cost of related hospitalizations and emergency room visits.

section.header: Addition of vaccines against COVID–19 to list of taxable vaccines

subsection.text: Section 4132(a)(1) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by adding at the end the following new subparagraph:

paragraph.text: The amendment made by this section shall apply to sales and uses on or after the later of—

subparagraph.text: the first day of the first month which begins more than 4 weeks after the date of the enactment of this Act, or

the date on which the Secretary of Health and Human Services lists any vaccine against COVID–19 for purposes of compensation for any vaccine-related injury or death through the Vaccine Injury Compensation Trust Fund.

paragraph.text: For purposes of paragraph (1) and section 4131 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, in the case of sales on or before the effective date described in such paragraph for which delivery is made after such date, the delivery date shall be considered the sale date.
